game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.description: In this quest, you must embark on a journey to find and retrieve the lost artifact. The artifact is said to possess great power and is crucial to saving the kingdom from disaster.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins, a powerful weapon, and the gratitude of the kingdom

task.description: Your second task is to decipher the cryptic message on the artifact that leads you to its location. The message was written in a language that only the skilled scholars can understand.
